greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence read from antidiagonals of rectangular array given by A(n,k) = 2^(2*k)*(Sum_{j=1..n-floor(n/2)-1} (cos(j*Pi/n))^(2*k)), rows n >= 3, columns k >= 0.
comment: Row indices n begin with 3, column indices k begin with 0.
mathematica: Table[Function[m, FullSimplify[2^(2 k)*Sum[Cos[j*Pi/m]^(2 k), {j, m - Floor[m/2] - 1}]]][n - k + 1], {n, 3, 12}, {k, 0, n - 2}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 18 2017 *)
results.author: _L. Edson Jeffery_, Nov 23 2013
